definition: To deactivate or turn off a device or light source, typically by using a switch or button. This term is commonly used when referring to electronic devices, lamps, or any other object that can be powered on or off.

examples.german: Kannst du bitte das Licht ausknipsen?
examples.english: Can you please switch off the light?

examples.german: Er knipste den Fernseher aus, bevor er ging.
examples.english: He switched off the TV before leaving.

examples.german: Ich knipse immer alle elektronischen Geräte aus, wenn ich das Haus verlasse.
examples.english: I always switch off all electronic devices when I leave the house.

examples.german: Sie knipste die Lampe aus, um Energie zu sparen.
examples.english: She turned off the lamp to save energy.

examples.german: Der Lehrer knipste das Licht aus, um die Aufmerksamkeit der Schüler zu bekommen.
examples.english: The teacher switched off the light to get the students' attention.
